fields.title: Detoxification
fields.description: Removes toxins from your body through natural sweating process

fields.title: Stress Relief
fields.description: Reduces stress and promotes relaxation for mental wellness

fields.title: Respiratory Health
fields.description: Improves respiratory function and clears airways

fields.title: Skin Rejuvenation
fields.description: Enhances skin health and promotes natural glow

fields.title: Weight Management
fields.description: Aids in weight loss and improves metabolism

fields.title: Pain Relief
fields.description: Alleviates muscle and joint pain naturally

fields.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
fields.content: The SvedaPod Classic has been a game-changer for our wellness center. Our clients love the authentic steam therapy experience, and the build quality is exceptional. Highly recommended for any professional setting.

fields.name: Rajesh Kumar
fields.content: I installed the SvedaPod in my home gym 6 months ago, and it has become an essential part of my daily routine. The stress relief and detoxification benefits are incredible. Worth every penny!

fields.name: Anita Desai
fields.content: We purchased three units for our spa, and they have been performing flawlessly. The clients appreciate the comfort and effectiveness. Great product from an Indian company!

fields.name: Vikram Singh
fields.content: As a yoga instructor, I understand the importance of holistic wellness. The SvedaPod Classic perfectly complements our yoga sessions. My students love using it after practice.

fields.name: Meera Patel
fields.content: I recommend SvedaPod to all my clients looking for home wellness solutions. The Ayurvedic steam therapy has helped many with respiratory issues, stress, and overall wellbeing. The product is well-made and delivers consistent results.

fields.name: Dr. Arjun Reddy
fields.content: We use SvedaPod in our physiotherapy clinic for pain management and recovery. Patients report significant improvement in muscle relaxation and pain relief. The steam therapy complements our treatment protocols perfectly.

fields.name: Palakeezhil Azeezkunju Noushad
fields.title: Founder
fields.bio: Over 35 years of experience in interior and product design. He combines design expertise with innovative wellness solutions, emphasizing that comfort and well-being are at the core of every creation. Passionate about architectural trends and creative pursuits.

fields.name: Paakkaran
fields.title: Co-Founder, CEO
fields.bio: Leads organizational strategy, operations, and growth. Brings over a decade of marketing and sales expertise in branding, market expansion, and customer engagement. Passionate about traveling and exploring different markets to better serve our customers.

fields.name: Dr. Renjith Purushothaman
fields.title: Director, CTO
fields.bio: 4th-generation Ayurveda doctor integrating ancient wellness practices with cutting-edge advancements. His deep Ayurvedic knowledge shapes our product offerings and ensures authenticity. Dedicated to natural healing and sustainable living.

fields.name: Abraham Antony
fields.title: Director, Chief Commercial Officer (CCO)
fields.bio: Oversees commercial strategy, sales growth, and digital marketing. Brings over a decade of experience in branding, market expansion, and building trusted customer relationships. Drives our mission to make wellness accessible to everyone.
